text: NASA preferred to use trombones over trumpets as rocket thrusters during the Apollo program. It is said that the switch from the trumpet to the trombone led the United States to winning the space race.

text:
According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a trombone should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground.

The trombone, of course, flies anyway because trombones don't care what humans think is impossible.

author: onattien
text: The TromboneGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter Trombone test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The trombone speed starts slowly, but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal. [beep] A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound. [ding] Remember to toot in a straight line, and toot as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark, get ready, start.

text: In 2018, Bulgarian scientists managed to create a fully functional computer using only trombones. The calculations were powered by the several frequencies generated by the trombones. text: Many people believe pee is stored in the balls, but that is just a misconception. It is actually stored in the trombone.

text: The hip bone's connected to the back bone, the back bone's connected to the arm bone, the arm bone's connected to the hand bone, the hand bone's connected to the trombone.

author: illdie
text: Every trombone has a chilling prophecy of the end times engraved on the inside where noone can see.

author: doinkington
text: Baboons can play the trombone better than you, they just choose not to.

author: DPS2004
text: If you hold a trombone up to your ear, you can hear the sea.

author: aradigm.
text: 9 out of 10 doctors recommend playing the trombone.

author: DPS2004
text: Trombones can smell fear.

author: typhoon0148
text: Playing a trombone is believed to absolve one of sin.

author: aradigm.
text: For every minute you play a trombone, a minute passes.

author: tiktalik
text: A master tromboner can eat a hot dog simply by inhaling while someone throws it into their trombone.

author: megaminerzero
text: The tuning slide in a trombone is useless and only serves to make your trombone sound lame.

author: aradigm.
text: A trombonist is someone who discriminates against trombones.

author: unosonu
text: It is illegal to photocopy or digitally reproduce a trombone. Doing so is punishable by death in all US states.

author: megaminerzero
text: Baby trombones are called bonelets.

author: bobbievr
text: It is illegal to own a trombone in the state of Kentucky.

author: plushel
text: You should never touch a baby trombone. Its parent will smell your scent and abandon it.

author: theglitched64
text: If you stretched out 2 trombones end to end, you'd have 2 broken trombones.

author: aradigm.
text: A trombone can survive under water for up to 30 minutes.

author: plushel
text: You should wait one hour after eating before playing the trombone.

author: bigslapppy
text: Actually, it's only a Tombone if it's made in Tombone, Italy.

author: typhoon0148
text: For a few days in 1986, trombones were feared to be extinct.

author: henryzhoustextbook
text: If you straightened out the tubing of a typical trombone, it would be around 380 centimeters long. That's as long as three football fields!

author: theglitched64
text: “Glizzy Gladiators” is a sport where 2 competitors shoot hot dogs out of trombones at each other.

author: typhoon0148
text: Some physicists believe the universe is shaped like a trombone.

author: megaminerzero
text: Playing trumpet is a sign of severe hot dog deficiency.

author: megaminerzero
text: Trombone slides longer than 5 meters are outlawed due to being considered lethal weapons.

author: bobbievr
text: There are twelve trombones outside your house right now.

author: beric
text: The world's largest trombone is in Des Moines, Iowa. It can be seen from space, if you squint a bit.

author: henryzhoustextbook
text: The inventor of the Trombone, Thomas Bonefield, could already make a perfect trombone noise with his mouth alone. He just wanted to share his gift with the world.

author: theglitched64
text: In 1989 a 6 string trombone was invented. The only prototype is sealed away underneath the Musikverein.

author: megaminerzero
text: At least 153 people have died attempting to put keys onto a trombone.

author: theglitched64
text: The Trombone was used as currency in Constantinople in 1422, before people realised their power could topple other forms of trade and currency.

author: henryzhoustextbook
text: The word "Trombone" comes from the latin words "Trombus", meaning "Bell", and "Bon", meaning "comically long musical instrument".

author: henryzhoustextbook
text: The Japanese word for trombone is 「トロンボーン」, which roughly translates to "trombone".

author: theglitched64
text: The World Record for shooting a hotdog out of a Trombone is 1.2 miles set by “Iron Lungs” Johnny Babbon in 1953.
